name: Crazy Gravity
description:
Crazy Gravity is a challenging Platform / Puzzle game about a little Astronaut lost in space, where your main objective is to energize your rocket and go home.

You will face the challenges of crazy gravity, leaving the gameplay with a greater difficulty.



Features:

  • - Crazy gravity - Many challenges await you in reverse gravity, where gameplay promises to "bug your brain"!

  • - High difficulty - 30 unique and hand-drawn levels for a challenging experience.

  • - Colorful and cartoonized graphics - If you like colorful and cartoonized graphics, you are in the right place! You will be enchanted by the level design and charisma of the little astronaut.

  • - Relaxing soundtrack - You will need a calmer soundtrack to calm down in moments of tension and also challenging!

  • - Unlock achievements - Achievement collectors will love to unlock the most challenging achievements in this game!

Have fun in this easy-to-learn yet hard-to-master game! You will need to practice to master the challenges of reverse gravity and beat the most tense levels.

Good Luck!
